mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.yisheng_yuyue_uuid_number as yishengYuyueUuidNumber ,a.yisheng_yuyue_name as yishengYuyueName ,a.yisheng_yuyue_types as yishengYuyueTypes ,a.yisheng_yuyue_time as yishengYuyueTime ,a.yisheng_yuyue_content as yishengYuyueContent ,a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_types as yishengYuyueYesnoTypes ,a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_text as yishengYuyueYesnoText ,a.yisheng_yuyue_shenhe_time as yishengYuyueShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number as yishengUuidNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_name as yishengName ,yisheng.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,yisheng.yisheng_id_number as yishengIdNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto ,yisheng.yisheng_email as yishengEmail ,yisheng.keshi_types as keshiTypes ,yisheng.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_address as yonghuAddress ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM yisheng_yuyue a left JOIN yisheng yisheng ON a.yisheng_id = yisheng.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId} )
and a.yisheng_yuyue_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengYuyueUuidNumber},'%')
and a.yisheng_yuyue_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengYuyueName},'%')
and a.yisheng_yuyue_types = #{params.yishengYuyueTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueTimeEnd})
and a.yisheng_yuyue_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengYuyueContent},'%')
and a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_types = #{params.yishengYuyueYesnoTypes}
and a.yisheng_yuyue_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengYuyueYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yisheng_yuyue_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengYuyueShenheTimeEnd})
and a.yisheng_id IS NOT NULL
and yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengUuidNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengIdNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengEmail},'%')
and yisheng.keshi_types = #{params.keshiTypes}
and yisheng.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuAddress},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
